amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 116-395 to delay wilderness designations under the Act until the affected county formally approves such designation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 116-395 to delay wilderness designations under the Act until the affected county formally approves such designation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 239 (Roll no. 61).
